artists.name: Aimnbreak
artists.description: For this project I wanted to explore new grounds and to combine my roots from Hip-Hop and IDM with instrumental Grime. I wanted my track to sound digital, clean and punchy with a rough edge. I have always been inspired by the UK underground dance scene and wanted to venture out in that direction, but with a more modern sound than previous projects.

artists.name: Bass Trolls
artists.description: Bass Trolls is a DIY live-and studio band. Both members come from a background as vinyl DJs and music producers. For the Bass Trolls project they play with live instruments and gadgets, as wel as working with synthesizers. They also collaborate with a number of vocalists and MCs.

artists.name: Gavana
artists.description: “Being a DJ, producer, remixer, music culture researcher as well as a label owner, Anna Gavanas is a mainstay of the Swedish electronic music scene. When producing, her perfect sense for musical intensity and mellowness guarantees a captivating listening experience.” (Gearjunkies, August 2012)

artists.name: HAb
artists.description: Swedish electronic music pioneer Hans Carlsson makes intricate melodic electronica with vague echoes of hip-hop and drum'n'bass under the name Hab. His music is a stunning collection of both rhythmically stunning and melodically engaging post-techno, interweaving thin, intricately syncopated percussion with thematic figures.

artists.name: Nuphlo
artists.description: Like no other producer, Nuphlo combines unexpected textures: from Leeds to Mumbai and everywhere inbetween. Spanning over references from ambient, acid, jungle, IDM, grime and hip hop he makes it seem effortless, coming across like a mesh rather than a clash. His music is approached from the Asian Underground.

artists.name: Ombudsman
artists.description: Ombudsman's music has more in common with hip hop than four-on-the-floor techno with tempo variations and rhythmic liberties of hip hop. Simultaneously, Ombudsman’s tracks are emotionally ambivalent – never clear cut as happy, sad, aggressive, and especially not accommodating.

artists.name: PhOniAndFlOrE
artists.description: PhOniAndFlOrE is a french producer who began in 2010 in MAO. Hooked on dub and all what surrounds him, he creates sounds in souhaitan and continuation. He is also a part of the collective Marée Bass that organizes free parties to enable networks and collaborations between dub artists.

artists.name: Pufferfisk
artists.description: Pufferfisk is a Swedish electronic music duo. With influences from artists such as Laserdance, Jean Michel Jarre and Fancy they make retro Italo/Electro influenced music. The group was formed in 2011 and have released music on Meerkat Recordings and Clubstream.

artists.name: Uzul
artists.description: French Bass music Dj/producer who gives true live performances shooting Bass music into live unexplored areas. Respected and remixed by artists such as such as Skream or N-Type. He is also a part of the dub collective Kaly Live Dub
